ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'CFM_Action_Plan', NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status__c ) , 'Awaiting Action Plan Approval'), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status__c ) , 'Action Plan in Progress'), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status__c ) , 'Action Plan in Review'))), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Awaiting Action Plan Approval'), ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'Advice Request'), ISCHANGED(Status__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Current status of action plan is other than 'Awaiting Action Plan Approval', 'Action Plan in Progress' or 'Action Plan in Review'. Status of action plan cannot be updated to 'Awaiting Action Plan Approval'
